title: Microsoft ancient lands (PC)
brief_description: The ancient world is yours to explore. What was life like for soldiers, servants and kings? Discover, through rich images, sound, animation and video, the mysteries and marvels of life in ancient times. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: A multimedia PC or compatible with a 386SX or higher microprocessor, 4MB of RAm, at least 2.5 MB of hard-disk space, CDROM drive, audio board, VGA display. MS-DOS operating system and Microsoft Windows, versions 3.1 or later.
